items.name: community1
items.title: Community1
items.description: A component featuring a logo, a call-to-action for joining a community, and social buttons.

items.name: contact7
items.title: Contact7
items.description: A contact block with title, description, and 3 columns for email, address, and phone, each with icons.

items.name: cta10
items.title: Cta10
items.description: A call-to-action component with a heading, description, and optional primary and secondary buttons arranged in a single column that becomes a row on larger screens.

items.name: cta11
items.title: Cta11
items.description: A component with heading, description, and up to two buttons, arranged vertically with emphasis styling.

items.name: faq1
items.title: Faq1
items.description: An accordion-style FAQ component with a customizable heading and list of questions and answers.

items.name: feature1
items.title: Feature1
items.description: A block with a 2-column layout featuring a title, description, two buttons, and an image.

items.name: feature2
items.title: Feature2
items.description: A block with a 2-column layout featuring a title, description, two buttons, and an image on the left.

items.name: feature13
items.title: Feature13
items.description: A component showcases a heading and 2-column layout of features with title, subtitle, description, and image. Unique for using images as visual endpoints in each feature card.

items.name: feature43
items.title: Feature43
items.description: A component showcasing 6 reasons with icons, titles, and descriptions in a 3-column grid for "Why Work With Us?".

items.name: list2
items.title: List2
items.description: A component displaying a list of awards with icons, titles, categories, and descriptions. Includes headings and buttons to view details.

items.name: navbar1
items.title: Navbar1
items.description: A navigational component with dynamic menus, offering desktop and mobile layouts, incorporating icons and accordion features for sub-menus.

items.name: pricing6
items.title: Pricing6
items.description: A pricing component with a heading, description, price, features list, and a call-to-action button. Features 3 groups of listed perks.

items.name: stats8
items.title: Stats8
items.description: A stats display component with a heading, description, and link, followed by a 4-column layout for statistics.

items.name: team1
items.title: Team1
items.description: A team showcase component with a title, subtitle, description, and a grid of member avatars, names, and roles, supporting up to 4 columns.

items.name: testimonial10
items.title: Testimonial10
items.description: A testimonial block with a central quote, author's name, role, and avatar in a vertical layout.
